name: redir-controller
description: Manage TCP Redir redirections in the server using secure HTTPS post requests

scripts.install: git clone https://github.com/troglobit/redir && cd redir && git checkout a8a67ee64257094b7f440b47c6232b9875153fa2 && gcc -shared -fpic redir.c -o libredir.so && mv libredir.so ../libredir.so && rm -rf redir

author: Lucas Zanella
